00025 #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>
00026 
00027 #include "Common/Mutex.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   class RangeMaintenanceGuard {
00032   public:
00033 
00034     RangeMaintenanceGuard() : m_in_progress(false) {}
00035 
00036     void activate() {
00037       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00038       if (m_in_progress)
00039         HT_THROW(Error::RANGESERVER_RANGE_BUSY, "");
00040       m_in_progress = true;
00041     }
00042 
00043     void deactivate() {
00044       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00045       m_in_progress = false;
00046       m_cond.notify_all();
00047     }
00048 
00049     void wait_for_complete() {
00050       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00051       while (m_in_progress)
00052         m_cond.wait(lock);
00053     }
00054 
00055     bool in_progress() {
00056       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00057       return m_in_progress;
00058     }
00059 
00060     class Activator {
00061     public:
00062       Activator(RangeMaintenanceGuard &guard) : m_guard(&guard) {
00063         m_guard->activate();
00064       }
00065       ~Activator() {
00066         m_guard->deactivate();
00067       }
00068     private:
00069       RangeMaintenanceGuard *m_guard;
00070     };
00071 
00072   private:
00073     Mutex m_mutex;
00074     boost::condition m_cond;
00075     bool m_in_progress;
00076   };
00077 
00078 }
